data.title: Albums Released This Week (July 18
data.meta_description: Here’s a sampling of the BEST music ever made! Great albums from the 60s, 70s and 80s rock and pop released this week (and some related albums of note):July 181960 ● Miles Davis —— Sketches of Spain ► Improv Jazz1961 ● Judy Garland —— Judy At Carnegie Hall ► Jazz Vocal1964 ● The Ventures —— […]
data.text:
